LanguageData.FlagstoneVacstone.label: vacstone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneVacstone.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.TileVacstone.label: vacstone tile
LanguageData.TileVacstone.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
